featured.text: But many others enjoy a good fear spectacle, and line up to see the latest scary movie.

definition.zh_def: 壯觀的景象或表演，通常引人注目或令人驚嘆。
definition.en_def: A visually striking performance or display, often impressive or eye-catching.
definition.example: The fireworks display was a spectacular spectacle that lit up the night sky.
